general_advisory: Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Choose the variety according to land type and resource available. The variety like Swarna Shreya of 115-125 days.
Aromatic paddy like New Kalajeera and Kalajeera. Change the certified seeds after three years.
If using own seeds, test the germination test before sowing.
In areas where rain is received, go for sowing the Dhaincha seeds @ 10kg/ac which should be incorporated in the field at 3 weeks stage prior to main kharif crop cultivation.
Harvest the crop at maturity stage. Avoid harvesting at over maturity stage as the pods will be shattered.
Choose quality seeds of Arhar like Upas-120, ICPl 86012, Pusa Arhar.
Choose the good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava @ 4 kg/ac. After getting good rainfall, prepare the land and sow the ragi seeds behind the plough.
Choose good varieties like Kalinga Maize, Prabal, etc @ 6 kg/ac. Spacing is 60 X 30 cm. Apply the basal dose of 8:16:16 kg NPK/ac after final land preparation.
Chose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri-6, Kalinga groundnut @ 75 kg/acre of pod. Treat the seeds with Vitavax power @ 2g/kg of seeds.
Just one hour before sowing treat with Rhizobium culture @ 20g/kg of seeds. At final land preparation apply 2 t FYM, 1q gypsum along with 8:16:16 kg NPK/acre. The spacing is 30 X 10 cm.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes namely Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi. Seed rate is 6-8 q/ac. Each piece should be 20g and contain 2-3 eyes. Treat the seeds before planting in the field.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga and Rashmi. Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac. The seed material should contain 2-3 eyes and of 20-25g per piece.
Due to rise in temperature provide the animal shed clean and sufficient drinking water.
Maintain the cleanliness in the animal shed. Do not leave the animals during hot time of the day.
Treat around 10 kg rhizome in 10 liters of water mixed with 40g Mancozeb and 10g Carbendazim and dry it under shade.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Also due to weather there may attack of Mites, to manage this spray Dicofol @ 3 ml/liter of water.
In Cucurbits, prepare poison baits for white flies by mixing 2 ml Malathion and 20g Jaggery in 1 liter of water. And keep the baits near the plants.

Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac. The seed material should be of 150-200 g. Prepare the well-pulverized field and make pits of 3 ft X 3 ft and of 1.5ft depth. After planting the pits should be filled with equal quantity of FYM and topsoil.
